title: Bug 3666: Code Completion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)
OB:
The code in the 'baz' call in 'bar' is changed to:

baz(x.foo().foo())

I would rather it gave me:

baz(x.foo()x.foo())
EB:
The code in the 'baz' call in 'bar' is changed to:

baz(x.foo().foo())

I would rather it gave me:

baz(x.foo()x.foo())

The choice amongst one or the other should be conditioned by a keystroke (enter=replace until end, insert=replace until cursor location).

Moving to ITPJUI.
SR: The code assist feature should allow for the choice between replacing until the end of the current identifier or until the cursor location. This choice should be conditioned by a keystroke (enter=replace until end, insert=replace until cursor location). Furthermore, the bug report should be moved to ITPJUI.
